Others: The Yankees lost to the Cardinals with a score of 14-7.
Nestor Cortes started the game but struggled, allowing five runs in four innings.
The Yankees' bullpen, particularly Tommy Kahnle, had a poor outing, allowing nine runs (eight earned) in the seventh inning.
Anthony Rizzo returned to the Yankees' lineup after being out for 2 1/2 months due to an injury.
The Yankees are currently one-half game ahead of the second-place Orioles in the American League East.
